Plot: A unique documentary about troops' experiences in Iraq and Afghanistan, based on writings by soldiers, Marines, and air men. Some writings were published in the New Yorker in summer 2006. A...
Title: Operation Homecoming: Writing the Wartime Experience
Writer: Colby Buzzell (story), Edward Parker Gyokeres (story), Sangjoon Han (story), Ed Hrivnak (story), Jack Lewis (story), John McCary (story), Denis Prior (story), Michael Strobl (story), Brian Turner (poems)
Actors: Sharon D. Allen, Beau Bridges, Colby Buzzell, Richard Currey
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
